'''''Nén''''' (nen-) is [[Quenya]] for "water".<ref name=etym>{{HM|LR}}, "[[The Etymologies]]"</ref>

See also [[root]] [[NENE]], [[Sindarin]] ''[[nen]]''.

==Examples==
* [[Cuiviénen]]
* [[Nenya]]
* [[Nénimë]]

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In earlier [[Qenya]], the word ''[[Nen (river in Valinor)|nen]]'' (with short ''e'') means "river, water".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-3207724789.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''nen (nend-)'' n.|website=Eldamo|accessed=11 April 2022}}</ref>
